sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix the sys class names of SAMS content tables and extended tables</description>
        <name>SAMS-Fix sys class name</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var tables = [
		'samp_sw_package',
		'samp_price_list',
		'samp_sw_publisher',
		'samp_content_version',
	];

	tables.forEach(function(parentTable) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord(parentTable);
		if (gr.isValid()) {
			var script = 'new global.SAMModelUtil().updateClassNameForTable(\'' + parentTable + '\');';
			GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script);
		}
	});
}());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-19 05:48:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>deb05decb7400010812509a6ee11a9cd</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SAMS-Fix sys class name</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_deb05decb7400010812509a6ee11a9cd</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-02 15:29:36</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
